step1.label: Habit Name
step1.quote: "The secret to getting results that last is to never stop making improvements."

step2.label: Make it Easy (2-Minute Version)
step2.subtitle: Scale it down to just 2 minutes.
step2.quote: "A new habit should not feel like a challenge. The actions that follow can be challenging, but the first two minutes should be easy."

step3.label: Make it Obvious (Implementation Intention)
step3.subtitle: I will [BEHAVIOR] at [TIME] in [LOCATION].
step3.placeholder: I will read at 8pm in my bedroom
step3.quote: "Many people think they lack motivation when what they really lack is clarity."

step4.label: Make it Obvious (Habit Stacking)
step4.subtitle: After I [CURRENT HABIT], I will [NEW HABIT].
step4.placeholder: After I pour my coffee, I will read 1 page
step4.quote: "One of the best ways to build a new habit is to identify a current habit you already do each day and then stack your new behavior on top."

step5.label: Schedule (Frequency)
step5.subtitle: How often do you want to do this habit?
step5.quote: "You do not rise to the level of your goals. You fall to the level of your systems."
